Html: Maybe I am missing something, but I do not see any difference in this code and what you can install from the toolkit that comes with the SDK.

Hi,
 These samples are not any different from Toolkit samples as of now.
We have plans to include experimental samples and blog samples in time.
You can now browse code online without downloading the toolkit.
You can fork and have updates to your codebase directly using git repository.
Thanks for the response. I am looking forward to seeing more posts in future.
